officialTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial for Optimal Feeding Tube Placement

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria: Patient admitted to pediatric floor, intermediate care unit, pediatric intensive care unit, or congenital care unit requiring post-pyloric feeding tube placement of size eight french or more and not meeting any of exclusion criteria

Exclusion Criteria: Under three kilograms, Open chest wall, Open abdominal wall

primary.description: Time taken for placement of enteral tube
primary.timeFrame: Baseline to End of procedure up to 30 minutes

secondary.description: Number of X-rays required to achieve correct tube placement
secondary.timeFrame: Baseline to End of procedure up to 30 minutes
